companies.company_name: Health and Happiness (H&H) International Holdings Limited

key_risks: Regulatory challenges in key markets, particularly China
Intense market competition in health and wellness sector
Dependence on China for significant revenue
controversies: Involvement in incidents negatively impacting stakeholders, environment, or operations (as per Sustainalytics' Controversies Research)
environmental_issues: Potential environmental risks related to product sourcing and manufacturing
social_issues: Product safety concerns, particularly in infant nutrition and health supplements
governance_issues: Potential governance risks linked to regulatory compliance and ESG controversies

sources.title: H&H Group - making people healthier and happier
sources.snippet: H&H Group is a global health and nutrition company for the whole family, and brings together eight international brands.
